author: Flywheel

project filter.description: A finder filter to use to select projects to include in the snapshot ('label=mylabel', 'group=mygroup', etc).  Will snapshot ALL matching projects.  If you want all projects snapshotted, enter 'ALL'

snapshot batch name.description: A name to associate with this batch of snapshots

description: Triggers a site-wide snapshot based off a provided filter

retry failed.description: Retry failed snapshots in a report csv

label: Sitewide Snapshot
name: sitewide-snapshot
